prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a jellyfish-like appearance and long tentacles.
I want a creature that resembles a deep-sea jellyfish, glowing in vibrant colors.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with a blue and red color scheme and a unique body shape.
Make a Pokemon that has large, expressive eyes and tentacles flowing like ribbons.
Imagine a creature that can swim gracefully and has a captivating, colorful design.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in ocean environments with a jellyfish-like form.
Show me a Pokemon with a mix of blue and gray that has both beauty and danger.
